features.name: Image Upload
features.description: Allows users to upload images directly from their device.

features.name: Image Cropping
features.description: Provides an interface for cropping the uploaded image within a modal.

features.name: Image Preview
features.description: Displays a live preview of the uploaded and processed image.

features.name: Base64 Encoding
features.description: Encodes the image data into a Base64 string for compatibility and ease of rendering.

features.name: Placeholder
features.description: Displays a customizable placeholder when no image is uploaded.

features.name: Disabled State
features.description: Prevents interaction with the component when disabled.

features.name: Dynamic Styling
features.description: Supports inline styles for flexible customization.

features.name: Event Hooks
features.description: Provides an `onChange` callback to handle changes in the uploaded image data.

props.name: name
props.description: Specifies the name of the input field for form integration.

props.name: value
props.description: Represents the current image value, including metadata and image data.

props.name: onChange
props.description: Callback function triggered when the image value changes.

props.name: placeholder
props.description: Text or content displayed when no image is uploaded.

props.name: disabled
props.description: Disables interaction with the component if set to true.

props.name: style
props.description: Inline styles to customize the appearance of the component.

props.name: standalone
props.description: Determines whether the component operates independently of form validation logic.
